front.title: IEEE Standard for Interconnection (OSI) Abstract Data Manipulation C Language Interfaces - Binding for Application Program Interfaces (API)
front.abstract: A C programming language binding for the general-purpose OSI Abstract Data Manipulation (OM) Application Program Interface (API) in IEEE Std 1224- 1993 is defined. This standard is intended for use by application developers, system implementors, test method writers, and users to support application portability at the source-code level. The API defined in this standard contains two major parts: an interface for accessing the services defined in the programming language independent specification, and an interface for language-specific services.
